item.title: Google Drive prices have been significantly reduced by Google
item.description:
A blog post published on March 13 revealed that Google significantly reduced prices for cloud storage. The monthly fees have been adjusted to US$1.99 for 100GB (previously US$4.99), US$9.99 for 1TB (previously US$49.99), and US$99.99 for 10TB, with the option to purchase additional terabytes as required. A 15 GB plan remains free of charge. This storage space can be utilized across Drive, Gmail, and Google+ Photos.
